resource.http://dev.llgc.org.uk/sas/full_text: A parallel is drawn between the kitten and the canary, another popular pet at the time (see <a href="https://www.persee.fr/doc/comm_0588-8018_2004_num_76_1_2162" target="_blank" rel="noopener">Del Col Eliane. Un statut pour les oiseaux de cage ?. In: Communications, 76, 2004. Nouvelles figures du sauvage, sous la direction de Sophie Bobbé. pp. 127-145). On this poster, cats are indubitably shown as pets.
resource.chars: A parallel is drawn between the kitten and the canary, another popular pet at the time (see Del Col Eliane. Un statut pour les oiseaux de cage ?. In: Communications, 76, 2004. Nouvelles figures du sauvage, sous la direction de Sophie Bobbé. pp. 127-145). On this poster, cats are indubitably shown as pets.

resource.http://dev.llgc.org.uk/sas/full_text: The international aspect of selective cat breeding is important, as it mainly began among the United Kingdom's upper-class. The first cat show was held in London in 1872.
resource.chars: The international aspect of selective cat breeding is important, as it mainly began among the United Kingdom's upper-class. The first cat show was held in London in 1872.

item.value: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'><path xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" d="M1823.20568,112.3502h763.3347v0h763.3347v172.52531v172.52531h-763.3347h-763.3347v-172.52531z" data-paper-data="{"strokeWidth":1,"rotation":0,"annotation":null,"nonHoverStrokeColor":["Color",1,0,1],"editable":true}" id="rectangle_83b926df-393d-4643-b28f-50f9eeaa1788" fill-opacity="0.00001" fill="#00bfff" fill-rule="nonzero" stroke="#ff00ff" stroke-width="13.45237" stroke-linecap="butt" stroke-linejoin="miter" stroke-miterlimit="10" stroke-dasharray="" stroke-dashoffset="0" font-family="none" font-weight="none" font-size="none" text-anchor="none" style="mix-blend-mode: normal"/></svg>

resource.http://dev.llgc.org.uk/sas/full_text: On this poster, we can see two adult cats alongside kittens. We can say that the emphasis is placed on cat breeding. Cat enthousiats started to select cats in order to create breeds in the middle of the XIXth century (see Wastlhuber, J. (1991). "History of domestic cats and cat breeds". In Pedersen, N.C. (ed.). Feline Husbandry: Diseases and management in the multiple-cat environment. Goleta: American Veterinary Publications. pp. 1–59. ISBN 9780939674299). However, this illustration focuses on diversity among cats : they are different in term of color and fur. In the late XIXth century, cat breeds were not fixed yet.
resource.chars: On this poster, we can see two adult cats alongside kittens. We can say that the emphasis is placed on cat breeding. Cat enthousiats started to select cats in order to create breeds in the middle of the XIXth century (see Wastlhuber, J. (1991). "History of domestic cats and cat breeds". In Pedersen, N.C. (ed.). Feline Husbandry: Diseases and management in the multiple-cat environment. Goleta: American Veterinary Publications. pp. 1–59. ISBN 9780939674299). However, this illustration focuses on diversity among cats : they are different in term of color and fur. In the late XIXth century, cat breeds were not fixed yet.

resource.http://dev.llgc.org.uk/sas/full_text: Le Journal was a daily newspaper first published in 1892. At the time, it was a literary and republican newspaper.
resource.chars: Le Journal was a daily newspaper first published in 1892. At the time, it was a literary and republican newspaper.
